   21: -module(ftp_format_SUITE).
   22: -author('ingela@erix.ericsson.se').
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include("ftp_internal.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   28: -compile(export_all).
   29: 
   30: suite() -> 
   31:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   32:      {timetrap,{seconds,5}}
   33:     ].
   34: 
   35: all() -> 
   36:     [{group, ftp_response}, format_error].
   37: 
   38: groups() -> 
   39:     [{ftp_response, [],
   40:       [ftp_150, ftp_200, ftp_220, ftp_226, ftp_257, ftp_331,
   41:        ftp_425, ftp_other_status_codes, ftp_multiple_lines_status_in_msg,
   42:        ftp_multiple_lines, ftp_multipel_ctrl_messages]}].
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   48:     ok.
   49: 
   50: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: 
   57: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: end_per_testcase(_, _) ->
   60:     ok.
   61: 
   62: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: %% Test cases starts here.
   64: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: 
   66: ftp_150() ->
   67:     [{doc, "Especially check that a response can be divided in a random place."}].
   68: ftp_150(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   69:     FtpResponse = ["150 ASCII data conn", "ection for /bin/ls ",
   70: 		   "(134.138.177", ".89,50434) (0 bytes).\r\n"],
   71:     
   72:     "150 ASCII data connection for /bin/ls "
   73: 	"(134.138.177.89,50434) (0 bytes).\r\n" = Msg =
   74: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
   75:     {pos_prel, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg).
   76:    
   77: ftp_200() ->
   78:     [{doc, "Especially check that a response can be divided after the first status "
   79:     "code character and in the end delimiter."}].
   80: ftp_200(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   81:     FtpResponse = ["2", "00 PORT command successful.", [?CR], [?LF]], 
   82:     
   83:     "200 PORT command successful.\r\n" =  Msg =
   84: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
   85:     {pos_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg),
   86:     ok.
   87: 
   88: ftp_220() ->
   89:     [{doc, "Especially check that a response can be divided after the "
   90:      "first white space "}].
   91: ftp_220(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   92:     FtpResponse = ["220 ","fingon FTP server (SunOS 5.8) ready.\r\n"], 
   93:     
   94:     "220 fingon FTP server (SunOS 5.8) ready.\r\n" = Msg =
   95: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
   96:     {pos_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg),
   97:     ok.
   98: 
   99: ftp_226() ->
  100:     [{doc, "Especially check that a response can be divided after second status code"
  101:     " character and in the end delimiter."}].
  102: ftp_226(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     FtpResponse = ["22" "6 Transfer complete.\r", [?LF]],
  104:     
  105:     "226 Transfer complete.\r\n"  = Msg =
  106: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
  107:     {pos_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg),
  108:     ok.
  109: 
  110: ftp_257() ->
  111:     [{doc, "Especially check that quoted chars do not cause a problem."}].
  112: ftp_257(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  113:     FtpResponse = ["257 \"/\" is current directory.\r\n"], 
  114:     
  115:     "257 \"/\" is current directory.\r\n" = Msg =
  116: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
  117:     {pos_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg),
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: ftp_331() ->
  121:     [{doc, "Especially check that a response can be divided after the third status "
  122:     " status code character."}].
  123: ftp_331(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  124:     %% Brake before white space after code
  125:     FtpResponse = 
  126: 	["331"," Guest login ok, send ient as password.\r\n"],
  127:     
  128:     "331 Guest login ok, send ient as password.\r\n" = Msg =
  129: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
  130:     {pos_interm, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg),
  131:     ok.
  132: 
  133: ftp_425() ->
  134:     [{doc, "Especially check a message that was received in only one part."}].
  135: ftp_425(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  136:     FtpResponse = 
  137: 	["425 Can't build data connection: Connection refused.\r\n"],
  138: 
  139:     "425 Can't build data connection: Connection refused.\r\n" 
  140: 	= Msg = parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
  141:     {trans_neg_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg),
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: ftp_multiple_lines_status_in_msg() ->
  145:     [{doc, "check that multiple lines gets parsed correct, even if we have "
  146:       " the status code within the msg being sent"}].
  147: ftp_multiple_lines_status_in_msg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  148:     ML = "230-User usr-230 is logged in\r\n" ++
  149:         "230 OK. Current directory is /\r\n",
  150:     {ok, ML, <<>>} = ftp_response:parse_lines(list_to_binary(ML), [], start),
  151:     ok.
  152: 
  153: ftp_multiple_lines() ->
  154:     [{doc, "Especially check multiple lines divided in significant places"}].
  155: ftp_multiple_lines(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  156:     FtpResponse =   ["21", "4","-The",
  157: 		     " following commands are recognized:\r\n"
  158: 		     "   USER    EPRT    STRU    MAIL*   ALLO    CWD",
  159: 		     "     STAT*   XRMD \r\n"
  160: 		     "   PASS    LPRT    MODE    MSND* "
  161: 		     "  REST*   XCWD    HELP    PWD  ", [?CRLF],
  162: 		     "   ACCT*   EPSV    RETR    MSOM*   RNFR    LIST  "
  163: 		     "  NOOP    XPWD \r\n",
  164: 		     "   REIN*   LPSV    STOR    MSAM*   RNTO    NLST "
  165: 		     "   MKD     CDUP \r\n"
  166: 		     "   QUIT    PASV    APPE    MRSQ*   ABOR    SITE* "
  167: 		     "  XMKD    XCUP \r\n"
  168: 		     "   PORT    TYPE    MLFL*   MRCP*   DELE    SYST "
  169: 		     "   RMD     STOU \r\n"
  170: 		     "214 (*'s => unimplemented)", [?CR], [?LF]],
  171: 
  172: 
  173:     FtpResponse1 =   ["214-", "The",
  174: 		      " following commands are recognized:\r\n"
  175: 		      "   USER    EPRT    STRU    MAIL*   ALLO    CWD",
  176: 		      "     STAT*   XRMD \r\n"
  177: 		      "   PASS    LPRT    MODE    MSND* "
  178: 		      "  REST*   XCWD    HELP    PWD  ", [?CRLF],
  179: 		      "   ACCT*   EPSV    RETR    MSOM*   RNFR    LIST  "
  180: 		      "  NOOP    XPWD \r\n",
  181: 		      "   REIN*   LPSV    STOR    MSAM*   RNTO    NLST "
  182: 		      "   MKD     CDUP \r\n"
  183: 		      "   QUIT    PASV    APPE    MRSQ*   ABOR    SITE* "
  184: 		      "  XMKD    XCUP \r\n"
  185: 			 "   PORT    TYPE    MLFL*   MRCP*   DELE    SYST "
  186: 		      "   RMD     STOU \r\n"
  187: 		      "2", "14 (*'s => unimplemented)", [?CR], [?LF]],
  188:     
  189:     FtpResponse2 =   ["214-", "The",
  190: 		      " following commands are recognized:\r\n"
  191: 		      "   USER    EPRT    STRU    MAIL*   ALLO    CWD",
  192: 		      "     STAT*   XRMD \r\n"
  193: 		      "   PASS    LPRT    MODE    MSND* "
  194: 		      "  REST*   XCWD    HELP    PWD  ", [?CRLF],
  195: 		      "   ACCT*   EPSV    RETR    MSOM*   RNFR    LIST  "
  196: 		      "  NOOP    XPWD \r\n",
  197: 		      "   REIN*   LPSV    STOR    MSAM*   RNTO    NLST "
  198: 		      "   MKD     CDUP \r\n"
  199: 		      "   QUIT    PASV    APPE    MRSQ*   ABOR    SITE* "
  200: 		      "  XMKD    XCUP \r\n"
  201: 		      "   PORT    TYPE    MLFL*   MRCP*   DELE    SYST "
  202: 		      "   RMD     STOU \r\n"
  203: 		      "21", "4"," (*'s => unimplemented)", [?CR], [?LF]],
  204:     
  205:     MultiLineResultStr = 
  206: 	"214-The following commands are recognized:\r\n"
  207: 	"   USER    EPRT    STRU    MAIL*   ALLO    CWD     STAT*   "
  208: 	"XRMD \r\n"
  209: 	"   PASS    LPRT    MODE    MSND*   REST*   XCWD    HELP    "
  210: 	"PWD  \r\n"
  211: 	"   ACCT*   EPSV    RETR    MSOM*   RNFR    LIST    NOOP    "
  212: 	"XPWD \r\n"
  213: 	"   REIN*   LPSV    STOR    MSAM*   RNTO    NLST    MKD     "
  214: 	"CDUP \r\n"
  215: 	"   QUIT    PASV    APPE    MRSQ*   ABOR    SITE*   XMKD    "
  216: 	"XCUP \r\n"
  217: 	"   PORT    TYPE    MLFL*   MRCP*   DELE    SYST    RMD     "
  218: 	"STOU \r\n"
  219: 	"214 (*'s => unimplemented)\r\n", 
  220:     
  221:     MultiLineResultStr =
  222: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse), 
  223:     {pos_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(MultiLineResultStr),
  224:     
  225:     MultiLineResultStr = parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], 
  226: 			       FtpResponse1),
  227:     
  228:     MultiLineResultStr = parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], 
  229: 			       FtpResponse2),
  230:     ok.
  231: 
  232: ftp_other_status_codes() ->
  233:     [{doc, "Check that other valid status codes, than the ones above, are handled"
  234:      "by ftp_response:interpret/1. Note that there are some ftp status codes" 
  235:      "that will not be received with the current ftp instruction support." 
  236:      "They are not included here."}].
  237: ftp_other_status_codes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  238: 
  239:     %% 1XX
  240:     {pos_prel, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("120 Foobar\r\n"),
  241:       
  242:     %% 2XX
  243:     {pos_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("202 Foobar\r\n"),
  244:     {pos_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("221 Foobar\r\n"),
  245:     {pos_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("227 Foobar\r\n"),
  246:     {pos_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("230 Foobar\r\n"),
  247:     {pos_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("250 Foobar\r\n"),
  248:     
  249:     %% 3XX
  250:     {pos_interm_acct, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("332 Foobar\r\n"),
  251:     {pos_interm, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("350 Foobar\r\n"),
  252: 
  253:     %% 4XX
  254:     {trans_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("421 Foobar\r\n"),
  255:     {trans_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("426 Foobar\r\n"),
  256:     {enofile, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("450 Foobar\r\n"),
  257:     {trans_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("451 Foobar\r\n"),
  258:     {etnospc, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("452 Foobar\r\n"),
  259: 
  260:     %% 5XX
  261:     {perm_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("500 Foobar\r\n"),
  262:     {perm_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("501 Foobar\r\n"),
  263:     {perm_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("503 Foobar\r\n"),
  264:     {perm_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("504 Foobar\r\n"),
  265:     {elogin, _ } = ftp_response:interpret("530 Foobar\r\n"),
  266:     {perm_neg_compl, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("532 Foobar\r\n"),
  267:     {epath, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("550 Foobar\r\n"),
  268:     {epnospc, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("552 Foobar\r\n"),
  269:     {efnamena, _ }  = ftp_response:interpret("553 Foobar\r\n"),
  270:     ok.
  271:        
  272: ftp_multipel_ctrl_messages() ->
  273:     [{doc, "The ftp server may send more than one control message as a reply," 
  274:      "check that they are handled one at the time."}].
  275: ftp_multipel_ctrl_messages(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  276:     FtpResponse = ["200 PORT command successful.\r\n200 Foobar\r\n"], 
  277:     
  278:     {"200 PORT command successful.\r\n" = Msg, NextMsg} =
  279: 	parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], FtpResponse),
  280:     {pos_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(Msg),
  281:     NewMsg = parse(ftp_response, parse_lines, [[], start], NextMsg),
  282:     {pos_compl, _} = ftp_response:interpret(NewMsg),
  283:     ok. 
  284: 
  285: 
  286: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  287: format_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  288:     "Synchronisation error during chunk sending." =
  289: 	ftp:formaterror(echunk),
  290:     "Session has been closed." = ftp:formaterror(eclosed),
  291:     "Connection to remote server prematurely closed." =
  292: 	ftp:formaterror(econn),
  293:     "File or directory already exists." =  ftp:formaterror(eexists),
  294:     "Host not found, FTP server not found, or connection rejected." =
  295: 	ftp:formaterror(ehost),
  296:     "User not logged in." = ftp:formaterror(elogin),
  297:     "Term is not a binary." = ftp:formaterror(enotbinary),
  298:     "No such file or directory, already exists, or permission denied."
  299: 	= ftp:formaterror(epath),
  300:     "No such type." = ftp:formaterror(etype),
  301:     "User name or password not valid." =  ftp:formaterror(euser),
  302:     "Insufficient storage space in system." = ftp:formaterror(etnospc),
  303:     "Exceeded storage allocation (for current directory or dataset)." 
  304: 	= ftp:formaterror(epnospc),
  305:     "File name not allowed." = ftp:formaterror(efnamena),
  306:     "Unknown error: foobar" = ftp:formaterror({error, foobar}).
  307:     
  308: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  309: %%% Internal functions
  310: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  311: parse(Module, Function, Args, Bin) when is_binary(Bin) ->
  312:     parse(Module, Function, Args, [binary_to_list(Bin)]);
  313: 
  314: parse(Module, Function, [AccLines, StatusCode], [Data | Rest]) ->
  315:     case  Module:Function(list_to_binary(Data), AccLines, StatusCode) of
  316: 	{ok, Result, <<>>} ->
  317: 	    Result;
  318: 	{ok, Result, Next} ->
  319: 	    {Result, Next};
  320: 	{continue, {NewData, NewAccLines, NewStatusCode}} ->
  321: 	    case Rest of
  322: 		[] ->
  323: 		    ct:fail({wrong_input, Data, Rest});
  324: 		[_ | _] ->
  325: 		    parse(Module, Function, [NewAccLines, NewStatusCode], 
  326: 			  [binary_to_list(NewData) ++ hd(Rest) | tl(Rest)])
  327: 	    end
  328:     end.
